1.「……ククク。そうだったのか。| この修行をこなすとは やはり| お前は ポルフ: ...... That's right... I thought you were|Porphan's brother...

2.「オレも かつては あいつの弟子だった。| 言うなれば お前の兄弟子ってとこだな: I used to be his protégé. Your brother, if|you will.

3.「知ってるか？ <pc>。| この修行をこなした奴だけが| 伝説の旅芸人に 近づ: You know what? <pc>.|Only those who have completed this training|can become a legendary traveling entertainer.

4.「オレも 修行を終えたところだ。| あの時は勝ちをゆずったが 今 この時において: I thought I'd finished my training. I gave up|the victory then, but now, in this moment,|you and I are evenly matched...

5.「フハハ！ オレは 誰にも止められねえ！| いずれ最強となり 世の中から恐れられ: Ha ha ha! No one can stop me! I'm going to be|the strongest, and become a legendary|traveling entertainer feared by the world!

6.「人を笑わせるだけで 満足してるような| ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！|:
I'm going to kill that stupid traveling|comedian who's only satisfied with making|people laugh! I'll show the world that art is|
|useless!

7.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。: ... You can't save people by doing tricks.

8.「頭に たたきこんでおけ。<pc>。| ポルファンは 人ひとり救えねえ クズ芸人: I'm going to knock it into your head.<pc> I'm sorry. You can't save a single person,|you scum...
